mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POKEMON (SEQ, NAME, NAME_KR, WEIGHT, HEIGHT, BASE_EXPERIENCE, FRONT_IMAGE, BACK_IMAGE, PIXEL_FRONT_IMAGE, PIXEL_BACK_IMAGE, DESCRIPTION, TYPE1, TYPE2 ,RAW_DATA) VALUES (#{seq}, #{name},#{nameKr}, #{weight}, #{height}, #{baseExperience}, #{frontImage}, #{backImage}, #{pixelFrontImage}, #{pixelBackImage}, #{description}, #{type1}, #{type2}, #{rawData})
mapper.select: SELECT P.SEQ, ROWNUM NUM, P.NAME, P.NAME_KR, P.WEIGHT, P.HEIGHT, P.BASE_EXPERIENCE, P.FRONT_IMAGE, P.BACK_IMAGE, P.PIXEL_FRONT_IMAGE, P.PIXEL_BACK_IMAGE, P.DESCRIPTION, P.TYPE1, P.TYPE2,P.RAW_DATA FROM POKEMON P WHERE P.seq=#{seq}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM NUM, P.* FROM POKEMON P ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE(0, 2000)) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POKEMON
AND NAME || NAME_KR || DESCRIPTION LIKE #{keyword}
